mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Money management
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Make your money work for you
mdRecord.dcterms:description: January is a time for making resolutions and one resolution that many people make at this time of the year involves money management and financial planning. Dr Edward Pierce of George Mason University discusses goals and strategies for building a financial portfolio
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: George Mason University "Frankly Speaking" radio show collection
